alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Herkimer County through 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Utica, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Frankfort, Ohio, Newport, Middleville, Poland, Cold Brook, Northwood, Russia, Fairfield, Norway, West Frankfort, Corrado Corners, Harbor, Farrel Corner, Countryman, Gulph, Parker Corners, Wilmurt Corners, Norwich Corners and Hurricane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
